alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Tammany Parish, west central Hancock and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 332 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bush, or 12 miles west of Picayune, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Slidell, Picayune, Pearl River, Sun, Bush and Slidell Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 78 and 81. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 4 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany
